'''Brit Logue''' is a police officer who led the search for [[Max Forrester]].

==History==
When [[Max Forrester]] disappeared from [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]], Brit gave assignments to her officers to search within a four-block radius of the hospital for Max. She was riding with [[Ryan Tanner]] when they spotted Max on the side of road. They called out to him, but he ran from them and fell into a manhole.

==Career==
She is a sergeant with the Seattle Metropolitan Police Department.
